name: recovibe-email-system
description: RecoVibe Event Management System with Email Notifications

scripts.test-email: node -e "const nodemailer = require('nodemailer'); require('dotenv').config(); const transporter = nodemailer.createTransport({service: 'gmail', auth: {user: process.env.EMAIL_USER, pass: process.env.EMAIL_PASSWORD}}); transporter.verify((error, success) => {if (error) console.log('❌ Email error:', error); else console.log('✅ Email ready!');});"
